job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Ready to architect the future of education? As a Senior Full-Stack Engineer at our cutting-edge EdTech company, you'll be the driving force behind AI-powered learning platforms that are revolutionizing how students engage with knowledge. If you're a technical virtuoso who craves autonomy, thrives on strategic decision-making, and wants to see your code transform lives, this is your stage.

   Imagine bringing historical figures to life through AI, crafting personalized magical stories that boost comprehension, or developing an AI learning copilot that integrates seamlessly with existing apps. These aren't just ideas - they're our products, and you'll be at the helm of their technical evolution.

   We're not looking for code monkeys or meeting enthusiasts. We're seeking a visionary engineer who can translate high-level concepts into robust, scalable architectures. Someone who sees beyond the current sprint and shapes the long-term trajectory of our products. If you're ready to make your mark on the intersection of AI and education, let's talk.

   What you will be doing

     * Architect and implement groundbreaking features that push the boundaries of AI-powered education
     * Lead technical discussions, translating product visions into concrete, scalable solutions
     * Drive the evolution of our tech stack, ensuring it remains cutting-edge and efficient
     * Make high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align technical capabilities with product goals

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Churning out code for short-term projects or chasing fleeting tech trends
     * Wasting time on internal IT systems or outsourced projects with no real-world impact
     * Getting bogged down in endless meetings or wrestling with tedious infrastructure issues
     * Following orders without the opportunity to influence product direction
     * Working on projects that don't leverage your full-stack expertise and strategic thinking, Transform our visionary EdTech concepts into robust, scalable realities that revolutionize how students learn and interact with educational content.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Full-Stack Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Ready to architect the future of education? As a Senior Full-Stack Engineer at our cutting-edge EdTech company, you'll be the driving force behind AI-powered learning platforms that are revolutionizing how students engage with knowledge. If you're a technical virtuoso who craves autonomy, thrives on strategic decision-making, and wants to see your code transform lives, this is your stage.

   Imagine bringing historical figures to life through AI, crafting personalized magical stories that boost comprehension, or developing an AI learning copilot that integrates seamlessly with existing apps. These aren't just ideas - they're our products, and you'll be at the helm of their technical evolution.

   We're not looking for code monkeys or meeting enthusiasts. We're seeking a visionary engineer who can translate high-level concepts into robust, scalable architectures. Someone who sees beyond the current sprint and shapes the long-term trajectory of our products. If you're ready to make your mark on the intersection of AI and education, let's talk.

   What you will be doing

     * Architect and implement groundbreaking features that push the boundaries of AI-powered education
     * Lead technical discussions, translating product visions into concrete, scalable solutions
     * Drive the evolution of our tech stack, ensuring it remains cutting-edge and efficient
     * Make high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align technical capabilities with product goals

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Churning out code for short-term projects or chasing fleeting tech trends
     * Wasting time on internal IT systems or outsourced projects with no real-world impact
     * Getting bogged down in endless meetings or wrestling with tedious infrastructure issues
     * Following orders without the opportunity to influence product direction
     * Working on projects that don't leverage your full-stack expertise and strategic thinking, Transform our visionary EdTech concepts into robust, scalable realities that revolutionize how students learn and interact with educational content.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on high-level architectural decisions and translating product visions into solutions, but lacks specific details about AI model development, data engineering, or MLOps. While it mentions AI-powered platforms, it doesn't specify the core AI engineering tasks required for such roles.

phrases: AI-powered learning platforms that are revolutionizing how students engage with knowledge
translate high-level concepts into robust, scalable architectures
shapes the long-term trajectory of our products
align technical capabilities with product goals
Transform our visionary EdTech concepts into robust, scalable realities that revolutionize how students learn and interact with educational content
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand the business domain (education), the strategic goals of the company (revolutionizing learning), and to translate business needs (visionary EdTech concepts) into technical strategies and architectures.

phrases: Drive the evolution of our tech stack
job_tasks.justification: The title 'Senior Full-Stack Engineer' and phrases like 'architect and implement features', 'robust, scalable architectures', 'tech stack', and 'full-stack expertise' directly point to traditional software development responsibilities.

phrases: technical virtuoso who craves autonomy, thrives on strategic decision-making
translate high-level concepts into robust, scalable architectures
shapes the long-term trajectory of our products
Transform our visionary EdTech concepts into robust, scalable realities
soft_skills.justification: The role requires strategic decision-making, translating abstract concepts into concrete solutions, and shaping long-term product direction, all of which are core to problem-solving and a pragmatic approach.

phrases: driving force behind AI-powered learning platforms
wants to see your code transform lives
at the helm of their technical evolution
shapes the long-term trajectory of our products
soft_skills.justification: The description emphasizes autonomy, leadership ('driving force', 'at the helm'), visionary thinking, and making a significant impact ('make your mark'), indicating a need for innovation and ownership.
The role explicitly mentions leading technical discussions and collaborating with cross-functional teams, highlighting the importance of communication and teamwork.
